questions.text: Which was the only player teamed up with Pele in the Brazilian National Team of the late 1960s and early 1970s and had a deformity in his legs?
questions.explanation:
Garrincha.

	Garrincha had one uneven leg and the other was crooked.

questions.text: It is alleged that this country 'sold out' to Argentina in a 1978 World Cup Group 2 game.  Who was it?
questions.explanation:
Peru.

	Peru 'sold out' to Argentina in the 1978 World Cup because Argentina needed 7 goals to qualify and it was 'obvious' that Peru had sold out.Argentina needed a 4 goals difference against Peru to come ahead of Brazil who played earlier and beat Poland 3 -1. They scored 6-0 and Brazil went to 3rd place, being the only undefeated team in the tournament, as Argentina lost to Italy 1-0, during the group phase.

questions.text: What two teams took part in the 1970 European Cup Finals?
questions.explanation:
Glasgow Celtic and Feyenoord.

	Glasgow Celtic lost to Feyenoord 2-1 in the final of the 1970 European Cup.

questions.text: Where did Roberto Carlos of Brazil begin his career?
questions.explanation:
Union San Juan de Araras.

	Roberto Carlos played with San Juan de Araras in 1991-1992.

questions.text: How many countries participated in the 1954 World Cup?

16.

	There were 16 countries at the 1954 World Cup in Switzerland.

questions.text: How many matches were played in the 1998 World Cup?
questions.explanation:
64.

questions.text: What country and club team does Patrik Berger play for?
questions.explanation:
Czech Republic, Liverpool.

	Patrik Berger is an attacking midfielder for the Czechs and Liverpool.

questions.text: Batistuta is going to which Italian club for the 2000-2001 series A season?
questions.explanation:
Roma.

	Batistuta was going to Inter Milan but they didn't want to top Roma's price for him.

questions.text: Who missed the penalty kick for Italy in the finals of the 1994 World cup, which gave victory and the championship to Brazil?
questions.explanation:
Roberto Baggio.

	In fact it was Roberto Baggio who lost Italy the championship.
